name: Rays of Giza
description:
This game was an impromptu submission for Weekly Game Jam #266 - the theme was "Sunrise or Sunset". Me and my friend put in roughly 25 hours of work and used it as a learning experience to get more acquainted with Godot. We learned a lot and had great fun making it, this was my first ever game jam!!

CREDITS
All programming by myself (Tim Day) and Dom Lawlor https://github.com/domlawlor
Chiptune track by me https://timday.bandcamp.com/

!! Me and Dom are not graphic artists !!
Most art assets from craftpix
Control button graphics from astralpixel
Sound effects are from freesound
Female voice assets by AmeAngelofSin
CC-BY-4.0
